emulib.runtime

Class PluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • emulib.runtime.PluginLoader

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class PluginLoader
extends Object
    This class provides methods for dynamic loading of emuStudio plug-ins (which in turn are JAR files.)

    • Constructor Summary

      PluginLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • loadPlugins

        public List<Class<Plugin>> loadPlugins(String password,
                                       File... pluginFiles)
                                throws InvalidPasswordException,
                                       IOException
        Loads emuStudio plugins. The plug-ins are loaded into separate class loader.
        Parameters:
        password - emuStudio password.
        pluginFiles - plugin files.
        Returns:
        List of plugins main classes
        Throws:
        InvalidPasswordException - if given password is invalid
        IOException - if other error happens

      • findDependencies

        public List<URL> findDependencies(File pluginFile)
                           throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • doesImplement

        public static boolean doesImplement(Class<?> theClass,
                                    Class<?> theInterface)
        Checks if a class implements given interface.
        Parameters:
        theClass - class that will be tested
        theInterface - interface that the class should implement
        Returns:
        true if the class implements given interface, false otherwise
